function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to regularly assess workplace hazards","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in workplaces","Mitigation":"Regular workplace hazard assessments and implementation of hazard control system","Technologies":"Workplace hazard assessment tools, hazard control systems","People":"Employers, employees","Owner":"Employers, workplace safety committees"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of COVID-19 in workplaces","Mitigation":"Installation of effective heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers","People":"Employees, visitors","Owner":"Employers, building management"},{"Description":"Lack of adherence to preventive measures","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in workplaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of preventive measures recommended by international organizations","Technologies":"PPE, workplace signage, hand hygiene stations","People":"Employees, visitors","Owner":"Employers, workplace safety committees"}]}
